dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The gem5 simulator is a modular platform for computer-system
architecture research, encompassing system-level architecture as well as
processor microarchitecture. gem5 is a community led project with an
open governance model. gem5 was originally conceived for computer
architecture research in academia, but it has grown to be used in
computer system design by academia, industry for research, and in
teaching.
dependent_to.name: gem5

dependent_to.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.
dependent_to.name: py-apache-beam

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description: Python scripts to find enrichment of GO terms
dependent_to.name: py-goatools

dependent_to.description:
Hatchet is a performance tool for analyzing hierarchical performance
data using a graph-indexed Pandas dataframe.
dependent_to.name: py-hatchet

dependent_to.description:
Multi-backend Keras. Keras 3 is a new multi-backend implementation of
the Keras API, with support for TensorFlow, JAX, and PyTorch.
dependent_to.name: py-keras

dependent_to.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.
dependent_to.name: py-networkx

dependent_to.description: Neuroimaging in Python: Pipelines and Interfaces.
dependent_to.name: py-nipype

dependent_to.description: Simple data dependent workflows in Python
dependent_to.name: py-parsl

dependent_to.description:
A Python library for W3C Provenance Data Model (PROV). A library for W3C
Provenance Data Model supporting PROV-JSON, PROV-XML and PROV-O (RDF)
dependent_to.name: py-prov

dependent_to.description:
The TF-Keras library is a pure TensorFlow implementation of Keras, based
on the legacy tf.keras codebase. Note that the "main" version of Keras
is now Keras 3 (formerly Keras Core), which is a multi-backend
implementation of Keras, supporting JAX, PyTorch, and TensorFlow. Keras
3 is being developed at keras-team/keras.
dependent_to.name: py-tf-keras

dependent_to.description:
Modular profiling toolkit and suite of libraries and tools for
C/C++/Fortran/CUDA/Python
dependent_to.name: timemory

description: Python interface to Graphviz's Dot language
name: py-pydot

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
